actions.name: Battleaxe
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 12 (2d8 + 3) slashing damage.

actions.name: Handaxe
actions.desc: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) slashing damage.

special_abilities.name: Giant Build
special_abilities.desc: The ogrekin counts as one size larger when determining carrying capacity and the weight it can push, drag, or lift. Its melee and thrown weapons deal an extra die of damage on a hit (included below).
